description: Short-term plans from the framework include reviewing travel links and infrastructure investment.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey's 'revive and thrive' recovery approved
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey's 'revive and thrive' recovery approved - BBC News
maintext: "In striving to meet that challenge we have the most significant opportunity, I would suggest, of our generation to improve our island and our bailiwick for the better," he added.
